subject: IS
title: Innovation for Leaders & Orgs.
info: History of innovation process, importance to individuals/organizations. Strategies to foster innovation. Responsibilities in innovation skill-building/leadership.

subject: IS
title: Introduction to Innovation
info: Key concepts/models from sociology, futures study, and business. Innovative, team leadership stratgies. Definition/application of just-in-time concept. Life-long self-improvement skills.

subject: IS
title: Final Project for IS
info: Either an internship in an organization or a hands-on study project on a contemporary issue or problem. Students apply expertise/ideas to a real-world situation.
prereqInfo: prereq: Completion of IS requirements, dept consent
